title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 17-21, 2025
description: The WoF answers from March 17 to 21. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for March 17-21, 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today during the third week of March 2025. We'll have the Fan Friday word as well.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today from March 17 to March 21, 2025. We’ll update this guide every day with the latest answers on a daily basis. For each day in the week, we’ll post the solution for the bonus round first and then provide the answer for the other toss-ups and regular puzzles after that. Festivals and celebrations are the general theme for this week’s Wheel of Fortune games, so they’ll be some answers related to vacations and parties. The solutions here are for the regular version of the show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White (we’ll have the solutions to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune in a separate post). Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Hawanya Jackson-Eliott, Ryan Halsey, and Jo Ann Bomkamp. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 17. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, March 17, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – I WOULD BE DELIGHTED [Phrase] Tossup #1 – HULA DANCE INSTRUCTOR [Occupation] Tossup #2 – GREEN SEA TURTLES [Living Things] Regular Puzzle #1 – MARGARITA, MOJITO, MIMOSA, MUDSLIDE [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – TAKING A BREAK FROM SOCIAL MEDIA [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #3 – JUST ANOTHER PERFECT DAY [Phrase] Tossup #3 – BILLBOARD [Thing] Tossup #4 – CORKBOARD [Thing] Tossup #5 – GOURMET CHEESE BOARD [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – DREAMS REALLY DO COME TRUE [Song Lyrics] Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, March 14: Bonus Round Puzzle – FUSE BOX [Around the House] Tossup #1 – MIDNIGHT TRAIN TO GEORGIA [Song TItle] Tossup #2 – DON’T PACK YOUR WHOLE CLOSET [Travel Tip] Regular Puzzle #1 – PUTTING TOGETHER A PUZZLE [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #2 – RUNNING LATE-NIGHT SNACK [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – ENCHANTING JOURNEY [Event] Tossup #3 – PASSENGER CAR [Place] Tossup #4 – SLEEPER CAR [Place] Tossup #5 – CLOWN CAR [Place] Regular Puzzle #4 – FEELING TRANSPORTED [What Are You Doing?] As usual for this season, the Fan Friday contest by Collette is still live. The Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some point during the March 21 episode. Wheel Watchers watching in Los Angeles have access to the Wheel Wednesdays Giveaway where they can win $1,000 every Wednesday through April 2.
html:
Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today from March 17 to March 21, 2025. We’ll update this guide every day with the latest answers on a daily basis. For each day in the week, we’ll post the solution for the bonus round first and then provide the answer for the other toss-ups and regular puzzles after that.

Festivals and celebrations are the general theme for this week’s Wheel of Fortune games, so they’ll be some answers related to vacations and parties. The solutions here are for the regular version of the show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White (we’ll have the solutions to Celebrity Wheel of Fortune in a separate post). Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Hawanya Jackson-Eliott, Ryan Halsey, and Jo Ann Bomkamp. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for March 17.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, March 17, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – I WOULD BE DELIGHTED [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – HULA DANCE INSTRUCTOR [Occupation]
  • Tossup #2 – GREEN SEA TURTLES [Living Things]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – MARGARITA, MOJITO, MIMOSA, MUDSLIDE [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – TAKING A BREAK FROM SOCIAL MEDIA [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – JUST ANOTHER PERFECT DAY [Phrase]
  • Tossup #3 – BILLBOARD [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – CORKBOARD [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – GOURMET CHEESE BOARD [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – DREAMS REALLY DO COME TRUE [Song Lyrics]

Here are the puzzle answers for Friday, March 14:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – FUSE BOX [Around the House]
  • Tossup #1 – MIDNIGHT TRAIN TO GEORGIA [Song TItle]
  • Tossup #2 – DON’T PACK YOUR WHOLE CLOSET [Travel Tip]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – PUTTING TOGETHER A PUZZLE [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – RUNNING LATE-NIGHT SNACK [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – ENCHANTING JOURNEY [Event]
  • Tossup #3 – PASSENGER CAR [Place]
  • Tossup #4 – SLEEPER CAR [Place]
  • Tossup #5 – CLOWN CAR [Place]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – FEELING TRANSPORTED [What Are You Doing?]

As usual for this season, the Fan Friday contest by Collette is still live. The Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some point during the March 21 episode.

Wheel Watchers watching in Los Angeles have access to the Wheel Wednesdays Giveaway where they can win $1,000 every Wednesday through April 2.
